entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 March 2023
